raw: Coronavirus: Coachella becomes latest music festival to be postponed .
replaced: Coachella becomes latest music festival to be postponed .

raw: The Coachella music festival , which was due to start on 10 April , has been postponed until October amid fears of spreading the coronavirus .
replaced: Coachella , has been postponed until October amid fears of spreading Coachella .

raw: The event , an annual highlight of the music scene since 2001 , was due to be held between 10 April and 19 April , at Indio , California .
replaced: Coachella was due to be held between 10 April and 19 April , at Indio , California .

raw: It is now scheduled for the weekends of 9 - 11 October and 16 - 18 October .
replaced: Coachella is now scheduled for the weekends of 9 - 11 October and 16 - 18 October .

raw: In a statement on the Coachella website , organisers said : " At the direction of the County of Riverside and local health authorities , we must sadly confirm the rescheduling of Coachella and Stagecoach due to Covid-19 concerns .
replaced: In a statement on the Coachella website , organisers said : " At the direction of the County of Riverside and local health authorities , organisers must sadly confirm the rescheduling of Coachella and Stagecoach due to Covid-19 concerns .

raw: " While this decision comes at a time of universal uncertainty , we take the safety and health of our guests , staff and community very seriously .
replaced: " While confirm comes at a time of universal uncertainty , organisers take the safety and health of organisers guests , staff and community very seriously .

raw: We urge everyone to follow the guidelines and protocols put forth by public health officials .
replaced: organisers urge everyone to follow the guidelines and protocols put forth by public health officials .

raw: " Coachella will now take place on October 9 , 10 and 11 and October 16 , 17 and 18 , 2020 .
replaced: " Coachella will now take place on October 9 , 10 and 11 and October 16 , 17 and 18 , 2020 .

raw: Stagecoach will take place on October 23 , 24 and 25 , 2020 .
replaced: Stagecoach will take place on October 23 , 24 and 25 , 2020 .

raw: All purchases for the April dates will be honored for the rescheduled October dates .
replaced: All purchases for the April dates will be honored for the rescheduled October dates .

raw: Purchasers will be notified by Friday , March 13 on how to obtain a refund if they are unable to attend .
replaced: Purchasers will be notified by Friday , March 13 on how to obtain a refund if Purchasers are unable to attend .

raw: " Thank you for your continued support and we look forward to seeing you in the desert this fall . "
replaced: " Thank you for you continued support and organisers look forward to seeing you in the desert this fall . "
